meta.description: Language labels for the status reports

languageKey.label: UTF8 Status Report
Get a status report about your site's UTF8 configuration.
Here you can find a short overview of your site's UTF8 parameters as well as any problems detected with your installation.
OK
Insecure
Disabled
Enabled
Empty
DB Server variables
DB tables
DB runtime variables
UTF8 collations
Available charsets
TYPO3 tables
Collations
Charsets
TYPO3 variables

You have TYPO3 forced to use utf8, but did not set setDBinit to use an utf8 connection. You should check that the following "DB server variable/DB runtime variables" are set to utf8: character_set_client,character_set_connection, character_set_results
You have set setDBinit to use utf8 connections, but did not forced TYPO3 to use utf8.
You have not configurted you TYPO3 system to use "utf8". To do so, go to the installtion module and set the variable "forceCharset" to "utf8".
TYPO3 with utf8
Webserver configuration
PHP variables and function calls
Some variables have undesired charsets set. Make sure this is no problem for you.
Some variables have undesired charsets set. But it does not seem to be a problem for this installation.
Some tables have undesired collation charsets. Make sure this is no problem for you.
You can run the toolboxutf8 _CLI-script using the "alter" option to change this.
